question: Is portfolio planning done at the same frequency as daily Scrum meetings?

ground_truth_answer: No, portfolio planning and daily Scrum meetings occur at very different frequencies. Portfolio planning tends to focus on a horizon of a year or more, involving stakeholders and product owners to determine which products to work on. In contrast, daily Scrum meetings occur every work day at the same time, and are timeboxed to around 15 minutes.
